titleStmt.title: Two sermons both preached at Northampton, one at the assizes March 1693, the other at a visitation October the 10th, 1694 by John Mansell ...
titleStmt.author: Mansell, John, 1644 or 5-1730.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Richardson for Brabazon Aylmer ...,

notesStmt.note: "A sermon preached at Northampton at a visitation ..." has special t.p. and separate paging.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
